description: Manages NTP authentication configuration on HUAWEI CloudEngine switches.

auth_type.description: Whether the given password is in cleartext or has been encrypted. If in cleartext, the device will encrypt it before storing it.

auth_pwd.description: Plain text with length of 1 to 255, encrypted text with length of 20 to 392.

trusted_key.description: Whether the given key is required to be supplied by a time source for the device to synchronize to the time source.

state.description: Manage the state of the resource.

authentication.description: Configure ntp authentication enable or unconfigure ntp authentication enable.
